Text:
"In The Lonely Hour (10th Anniversary Edition) is out today 
A decade of the album that changed my life forever. Feels unreal. 
I've put my heart and soul into this, and I hope you love it. Happy 10 years Sailors xx
Also, surprise... I'm Not The Only One feat. 
@aliciakeys
 is

"In The Lonely Hour 10X Platinum 

I am blown away by the response to this album, In The Lonely Hour was my first declaration in music and I will always be proud of that. I still love singing the songs on this album and I am so honoured to now be in the company of some of the

"In The Lonely Hour 10X Platinum 

I am blown away by the response to this album, In The Lonely Hour was my first declaration in music and I will always be proud of that. I still love singing the songs on this album and I am so honoured to now be in the company of some of the

"It was a true honour and privilege to be in a room with such beautiful soul in Glenn to record this legendary and very special song with him. It’s a moment in time I will never forget and I am so happy to have been a part of this wonderful project."
http://lnk.to/evernew
Thank You X

“I can’t believe the Gloria era has officially ended. I am overwhelmed and dizzy with love and gratitude. Thank you to every single soul who believed in me and rejoiced in the music with us. Time for the next chapter. But first…. I’m gonna catch up on some sleep if that’s ok.

“BERLIN! That was emotional. 
We couldn’t have asked for a more special show to finish Gloria The Blackout. Thank you so much. We love you ”

“MUNICH!! You were amazing. Our last show tonight !  Lollapalooza Berlin we’re ready for you ! ”

“I’m so proud and honoured to be involved in this important record from the legendary Red Hot series. Music is always the best way of bringing people together. To be amongst so many incredible voices, representing for the community could not make me happier”

Sam Smith welcomes you to The Pink House.

Join them as they sit down with friends and queer icons to explore their own "Pink Houses"—how they navigated early struggles and ultimately found their place in the world.

Discover how to love yourself, show up for others, and create a
STOCKHOLM

Thank you for the love.
